segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is turning into a disgusting mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflowing from the sink, drenching the cabinets—revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor spreading like some filthy spill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman just stands there, oblivious in her wet apron.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot soaking in that nasty water—how gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids rummaging in the cookie jar, hands all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool wobbling, threatening to add to the disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Crumbly cookies and potential falls—it's all so unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, probably getting sticky fingers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open window letting in fresh air, but inside it's stale and sloppy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, waiting for this watery doom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view mocks the interior sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look at this without feeling queasy about the neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR
